akn:section.akn:heading: Designation of Small State and Rural Advocate

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The President shall designate in the Federal Emergency Management Agency a Small State and Rural Advocate.
(b) Responsibilities The Small State and Rural Advocate shall be an advocate for the fair treatment of small States and rural communities in the provision of assistance under this chapter.
